mapper.sql: ID, NAME, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NO_NUM, JOB_TITLE_CODE, IDCARD, GENDER_CODE, NATION_CODE, GOOD_AT_FIELD, PERSONAL_PROFILE, AVATAR, OFFICE_PHONE, IS_ENABLED, ENABLE_DATE, DISABLED_DATE, IS_DELETED, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, ORG_ID, DEPT_ID, POST_CODE
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_ORG WHERE SYS_ORG.ID = t.ORG_ID) ORG_NAME, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM SYS_DEPT WHERE SYS_DEPT.ID = t.DEPT_ID) DEPT_NAME, (SELECT DICT_LABEL FROM SYS_DICT_DATA WHERE SYS_DICT_DATA.DICT_TYPE = 'JOB' AND SYS_DICT_DATA.DICT_VALUE = t.JOB_TITLE_CODE) JOB_NAME, (SELECT DICT_LABEL FROM SYS_DICT_DATA WHERE SYS_DICT_DATA.DICT_TYPE = 'POST' AND SYS_DICT_DATA.DICT_VALUE = t.POST_CODE) POST_NAME, (SELECT DICT_LABEL FROM SYS_DICT_DATA WHERE SYS_DICT_DATA.DICT_TYPE = 'SEX' AND SYS_DICT_DATA.DICT_VALUE = t.GENDER_CODE) GENDER_NAME FROM SYS_USER t WHERE t.ID = #{id}
